name: df-resf
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cresf, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cop(cres(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), cdm(cdm(cv(s1)))), cmpt(s2, cdm(cv(s1)), cres(cfv(cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)), cv(s2)), cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))))
comment: Define the restriction of a functor to a subcategory (analogue of ~ df-res ). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2017.)
